items.title: Man City beat Real Madrid to pile pressure on Alonso
items.summary: Goals from Nico O'Reilly and Erling Haaland give Manchester City a 2-1 victory over Real Madrid at the Bernabeu, to pile pressure on Madrid manager Xabi Alonso.

items.title: Cornelius scores late winner as Copenhagen win at Villarreal
items.summary: Andreas Cornelius scores a stoppage-time winner as Copenhagen beat Villarreal 3-2 in the Champions League.

items.title: Atalanta fight back to dent Chelsea Champions League hopes
items.summary: Chelsea's hopes of qualifying automatically for the Champions League knockouts were dealt a blow as Atalanta come from 1-0 down to win in Bergamo.

items.title: Kudus and Simons score as Tottenham beat Slavia Prague
items.summary: Mohammed Kudus and Xavi Simons both score from the penalty spot for Tottenham Hotspur in a 3-0 win against Slavia Prague.

items.title: 'Magic' Martinelli scores stunning third for Arsenal
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli becomes the first Arsenal player to score in five Champions League games in a row after netting a stunning third goal for the Gunners against Club Brugge.

items.title: Szoboszlai scores late penalty as Liverpool beat Inter
items.summary: Dominik Szoboszlai scores a late penalty as Liverpool claim a 1-0 away win over Inter Milan 1-0 in the Champions League.

items.title: O'Reilly equalises for Man City against Real Madrid
items.summary: Manchester City's Nico O'Reilly fires home from close range against Real Madrid to make it 1-1 in their Champions League match at the Bernabeu.

items.title: 'Remarkable' Madueke goal puts Arsenal ahead against Club Brugge
items.summary: Noni Madueke scores a "remarkable" goal to give Arsenal the lead against Club Brugge in the Champions League.

items.title: Instagram now lets you see and control your algorithm
items.summary: Today, Instagram has announced that it's allowing you to see and control your Reels algorithm for the first time. You just tap the icon showing two lines with hearts located in the upper right corner. There, you can see what topics Instagram thinks you're interested in, and you can choose which of â€¦
